name: Billy Pancakes and the Rabid Carrot Munchers
name_original: Billy Pancakes and the Rabid Carrot Munchers
description:
This game is a prequal to https://bastisbastis.itch.io/billy-pancakes-and-his-quest-for-affordable-eye-surgery.

Billy Pancakes’ job is to sort carrots alphabetically at a super market. He takes great pride in his work.

But the warehouse is suffering from a terrible infestation of RABID CARROT MUNCHERS!

Billy has taken it upon himself to trap all the carrot munchers before they eat all the carrots.

Controls:

Keyboard/Mouse:

A, S, W, D for movement

Click inside the game window on each level to enable mouse look.

Click left mouse button to kick

Press SPACE to jump

ESC to restart level


Touch screen:

Hold and drag with one finger to move

Hold and tap with a second finger on the bottom half of the screen to KICK

Hold and tap with a second finger on the top half of the screen to JUMP

Tap with 3 fingers to restart level

The game was made for the Game Dev Field Guide's Monthly Game Jam 16.

Billy's animations are from Mixamo, all other assets are made for the game during the game jam time frame.

Way too much time was spent making the game during May 2022.
